LanguageData.OGT_AirStrike_BurstCannon.label: burst cannon run
LanguageData.OGT_AirStrike_BurstCannon.description: Strike ship fills the air with bullets with its twin burst cannons. Covers a large area. Particularly effective against unarmored units.
LanguageData.OGT_AirStrike_PlasmaRifle.label: plasma rifle assault
LanguageData.OGT_AirStrike_PlasmaRifle.description: The powerful frontal plasma rifle can deal high damages to armored units and buildings. It does not cover a wide area though.
LanguageData.OGT_AirStrike_Railgun.label: splinter cannon and darklance strafe run
LanguageData.OGT_AirStrike_Railgun.description: Strike ship attacks with both gatling guns and darklances. A truly devastative assault.
